attributes.action: Introduce a National Day in honour of NHS staff. A day to show appreciation
attributes.additional_details:
Given the current dedication, bravery and care, that all staff across all NHS platforms have shown at this time of crisis, there deserves to be a permanent reminder and day to recognise their hard work. 
The NHS staff are caring for us, now it is time for us to show our care back.
attributes.background:
Introduce a nationally recognised day to honour the work carried out all NHS staff. A permanent reminder of their lasting dedication to the country and it’s people. 
“National NHS Worker appreciation Day”.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
